Package edu.illinois.mitra.starl.functions

Classes for performing various functions and algorithms, chiefly dealing with distributed comptutation and synchronization.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarrierSynchronizer
    The BarrierSynchronizer class is used to synchronize all agents to a known point.
    BullyLeaderElection
    Elects a leader using the Bully algorithm.
    DSMMultipleAttr  
    Geocaster
    Sends and receives messages with a geographic destination instead of an agential (invented word) destination.
    GroupSetMutex  
    PickedLeaderElection
    Elects a leader.
    RandomLeaderElection
    Leader election algorithm which picks a random robot from all of the participants.
    SingleHopMutualExclusion
    A mutual exclusion implementation in which permission tokens are exchanged in a single message "hop".

Package edu.illinois.mitra.starl.functions Description

Classes for performing various functions and algorithms, chiefly dealing with distributed comptutation and synchronization.
